doc:
Michelle Thomas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michelle_Thomas 0 Michelle Doris Thomas (September 23, 1968 – December 22, or 23, 1998) was an American actress and comedian. She was best known for her roles as Justine Phillips on the NBC sitcom The Cosby Show (1988–90), and Myra Monkhouse, Steve Urkel's girlfriend on the ABC/CBS sitcom Family Matters (1993–98). Michelle_Doris_Thomas ( September_23_,_1968 – December_22 , or 23 , 1998 ) was an_American_actress_and_comedian . She was_best_known for her_roles as Justine_Phillips on the_NBC_sitcom The_Cosby_Show_(_1988 – 90_) , and Myra_Monkhouse , Steve_Urkel 's_girlfriend on the_ABC/CBS_sitcom_Family_Matters_(_1993 – 98 ) .
